name: Jamie Callan
content: Jamie Callan Brief bio Jamie Callan Professor and Ph.D. Program Director Language Technologies Institute (School of Computer Science) Office: 5503 Gates Hillman Complex Phone: +1 412-268-4525 Fax: +1 412-268-6298 Email: callancs.cmu.edu Mailing Address: Carnegie Mellon University 5000 Forbes Avenue Gates Hillman Complex 5407, LTI Pittsburgh, PA 15213 My Research Group People and places Research Projects Search Engine Architectures * The Lemur Project * Neural Search Engine Architectures * TREC 2025 Million LLMs Track Publications Papers & Virtual Appendices Ph.D. Dissertations Edited Volumes Workshop Proceedings Datasets (e.g., ClueWeb09, ClueWeb12, ClueWeb22) Services Google Scholar profile Semantic Scholar profile Teaching 11-442 / 11-642 / 11-742: Search Engines, (Fall, Spring) 11-743: Self-Paced IR Lab, (upon request) Independent study or IR lab projects Other Useful Information Information for Visitors Information for CMU Students Updated on May 30, 2025
